name: Crittercism
description: Crittercism, based in San Francisco, California, is the world’s first mobile app performance management (APM) solution.  It offers a real-time global view of crash reporting and error analysis across iOS, Android, Windows Phone 8 and HTML5 on over 450 million unique devices and 50 billion app loads. The company’s investors include Kleiner Perkins, Opus Capital, Shasta Ventures and Google Ventures.

apis.name: Crittercism
apis.description: Crittercism is a mobile application error monitoring and network monitoring service. Crittercism allows application owners and developers access application diagnostics and identify errors and problems.nnThe Crittercism API allows developers to access and integrate the functionality of Crittercism with other applications. Public documentation is not available; API access comes with a premium Crittercism account.
